segments.text: I see the chaos unfolding around me, the kitchen full of little moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing for cookies is a mix of bravery and foolishness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, there’s something endearing about his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I can’t ignore the fear that he might fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s ignorance of the overflowing sink is astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel an unsettling churn in my stomach as I watch the water rise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl looks up at her brother, her expression full of hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is a poignant reminder of how quickly things can go awry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think back to my own childhood, sneaking snacks and feeling invincible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But in this moment, I wish for the woman to wake up to the reality around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
